userLookup.inputError: Please enter a Discord User ID

guildLookup.title: Guild Lookup
guildLookup.description: Search and track Discord servers using their Guild ID. View detailed information about servers, including member count, creation date, and more.

applicationLookup.title: Application Lookup
applicationLookup.description: Look up Discord applications and bots. Get detailed information about verified status, permissions, and presence across servers.

prevnamesLookup.title: Previous Names Lookup
prevnamesLookup.description: Track username history and changes across Discord. See when and how often users change their names, and maintain a comprehensive history.
